extension.description: This repository contains the BetaSeries.com add-on for XBMC and maintains it up to date
Ce dépôt contient l'extension BetaSeries.com pour XBMC et permet de la maintenir à jour
extension.disclaimer: If it breaks, you get to keep the pieces
extension.news: v1.0.4 [add] github asset v1.0.3 [add] github release repo v1.0.2 [udp] repository url update v1.0.1 [fix] missing icon
